title: Dazzling Diamond Vanki/Armlet Upper Arm Band Design
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds. Diamonds are of VS clarity and G color
ensuring maximum sparkle. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Vanki design, featuring an elegant, openwork leaf and vine motif. Each diamond is carefully pave-set, creating a continuous shimmer. The design allows for comfortable wear on the upper arm, perfectly balanced and secure. Upper arm band is of high quality.
colors: Predominantly golden with sparkling white diamonds
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a sophisticated statement. This piece elevates any ethnic or Western outfit.
description: A fusion of traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship ensure a timeless piece that will be treasured for generations. Vanki is considered auspicious and a symbol of strength and beauty. This piece is comfortable, secure, and dazzling to behold.
